rules_text:
First strike
[i]Student of the Officers Academy[/i] – Whenever Cassandra, Youthful Thunder attacks, you may pay {1}. When you do, create a 1/1 white Noble creature token that is tapped and attacking.
[i]Crit [/i]– Whenever Cassandra deals combat damage to a player, forge.
[i]Fighting Spirit [/i]– {W}: Regenerate Cassandra.
